title: Arlington House, The Robert  E. Lee Memorial: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions         Dean DeRosa  Public Transportation: The Memorial is accessible by the Blue Line of the Metro subway system. The Arlington Cemetery subway station is near the Visitor Center for the cemetery. Car: Arlington House is located inside Arlington National Cemetery. From Washington DC you can drive to the cemetery by crossing the Memorial Bridge. In Virginia Detailed driving directions can be found in the Carpooling/ Vanpooling section. Parking: Unauthorized vehicles cannot drive into the cemetery. Parking for Arlington House is available at the Arlington National Cemetery Visitor Center. Handicapped parking is available at the Old Administration Building, located behind Arlington House.
